title: Create meta-branch
content: As a project manager I want create a meta-branch on some repository so i can start storing meta-data on it

acceptance_criteria.criteria: Be able to run 'git tabs meta-branch'
'git tabs meta-branch' need a json-schema file as parameter
New branch named after json-schema file must be added
New branch must have a single file: the json-schema file
Commit the new file to the branch
